SELECT g.goods_id as goodsId, g.goods_name as goodsName, g.goods_info as goodsInfo, g.state_on as stateOn, g.category_id as categoryId, c.category_name as categoryName, g.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName, g.goods_img_id as goodsImgId, i.image_url as imageUrl, DATE_FORMAT(g.CREATED_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createdTime FROM goods g left join category c on g.category_id=c.category_id left join user u on g.user_id=u.user_id left join image i on g.goods_img_id=i.image_id where g.is_delete=0

order by g.CREATED_TIME desc
